dublinCore.dc:title: 116 HR 6287 IH: Success for Military Connected Students Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Bacon (for himself and Mr. Jackson of North Carolina) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services, and in addition to the Committee on Education and the Workforce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To extend the requirement to staff Department of Defense Education Activity schools to maintain maximum student-to-teacher ratios.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Success for Military Connected Students Act of 2023.

section.header: Staffing of Department of Defense Education Activity schools to maintain maximum student-to-teacher ratios
section.text: Section 589B(c) of the William M. (Mac) Thornberry National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2021 (Public Law 116–283; 134 Stat. 3659) is amended by striking 2023–2024 academic year and inserting 2029–2030 academic year.
